title: Dancing in the Sunlight
description: A hypnotic blend of atmospheric drum and bass, Dancing in the Sunlight showcases  Juelz-101 & Emma MT's evocative artistry. Beneath its shimmering layers lies a haunting narrative—every beat and melody whispering secrets of resilience, solitude, and finding light in the shadows of a brutalist world.

lyrics.intro:
Feel the summer, feel the heat (oh)
Rays are shining, life’s complete (yeah)
All around us, laughter flows
As the gentle sea breeze blows
lyrics.chorus:
We’re dancing in the sunlight
Together, it just feels right
Every heartbeat with the baseline
Our troubles out of sight

Bass drops, rhythms collide
Let the funky beats be your guide
lyrics.verse_2:
Feel the pulse, electric vibe
Groove united, side by side
Heavy beats, our feet align
Sky so blue, our spirits soar
Let the music give us more
Under stars, we come alive
With every note, our souls revive
lyrics.chorus_3:
We’re dancing in the limelight
Together, it just feels right
Every heartbeat with the baseline
Our troubles out of sight
lyrics.bridge_2:
The night's melody, takes us high
In this moment, you and I
With the music in the air
Every moment, so rare
lyrics.verse_3:
As the final notes draw near
In each whisper, I hold you dear
Feel the summer, feel the heat
In each other, we are complete
’Til the dawn breaks, in delight
We’ll be dancing through the night
A kiss to all, a wave goodbye
Underneath the star-lit sky
With every word, she stole the night
With every song, she made it right
Now she’s vanished with the breeze
But her melody…. ?

We’re dancing in the twilight
Stars reflecting in our eyes
Every heartbeat in the spotlight
The night where dreams arise

Goodnight from the queen of air

interview.speaker: Codie
interview.dialogue: Hello Emma MT, let's begin by talking about your first release "Dancing in the Sunlight", can you tell us what it is about?

interview.speaker: Emma MT
interview.dialogue: Hi Codie. On the surface the song is about, well dancing in the sunlight, but it has a much deeper meaning for those who listen closely.

interview.speaker: Codie
interview.dialogue: Sounds interesting, can you give us an insight to the production of the track?

interview.speaker: Emma MT
interview.dialogue: Well as a DNB raver, I always want to stick to my routes, but I wanted to evolved from beat focused conventional DNB and shift towards a more story driven style. After brainstorming with Juelz-101, we decided on a new album called "Brutalistening", which will be story driven and have a more atmospheric feel. This is the first song that we have made for the album.

interview.speaker: Codie
interview.dialogue: That sounds like a very exciting project. Is there any risk involved with releasing such an unconventional album?

interview.speaker: Emma MT
interview.dialogue: Risk? From a corperate standpoint, of course. This album wouldn't see the light of day. We are artists, with a passion for the art that we make. We have no concerns with profits or statistics, if I can speak to 1 listener then I have succeeded, which I have already achived because this album speaks to me on a deep level.

interview.speaker: Codie
interview.dialogue: In regards to the album, can we get a sneak-peak of what else is to come?

interview.speaker: Emma MT
interview.dialogue: Well I don't want to say too much, but just last week Juelz and I were brainstorming lyrics for a song for the album called "Concrete Heart" and it almost brought me to tears. We begin recording on Monday and I am so excited for this one.

interview.speaker: Codie
interview.dialogue: I look forward to checking in once that song is complete.
